# [dnscrypt-proxy 2.1.1]

# Chrome DoT DNS enhancement + keweoff!
# Quad9 probably ignored because it's a stable default for dnscrypt-proxy, except EDNS servers, using default Quad9 seems enough
# because it's already block malware threats, using EDNS is optional but it may share data with CDNs, e.g. Crapflare!
